name: Ch13BBaseConvo3
_source: speak;Joshua;What does it look like?|I'm searching for treasure!
speak;Marisa;Why do boys love playing in mud so much?|First Ewan, now you...
speak;Joshua;Ewan was here?|Did he find anything?
speak;Joshua;A ring!|So the rumors are true!
speak;Joshua;This marsh is said to contain a secret treasure.|A mystical ring and an ancient sword.
speak;Marisa;...Sounds like a tale for children.
speak;Joshua;Care to make a wager on it?|I bet we find something valuable in the next five minutes.
speak;Joshua;Hmm...|Where do you think it would be?|The deepest part of the marsh?|Or maybe under that fallen log?
speak;Marisa;*sigh*|Fine.|If I help, will you stop making noise?
speak;Joshua;That's the spirit!|Two pairs of eyes are better than one.
speak;Marisa;I'd check near the reeds.|Water flows there, bringing objects with it.
speak;Joshua;We did it!|It's... it's a sword!
speak;Marisa;...An earth sword?|Those are quite rare.
speak;Joshua;Not just any earth sword!|Look at these markings.|This is a mystic earth sword!|It can drain life from enemies.
speak;Joshua;I've seen one before.|My mother had one in the royal treasury.
speak;Joshua;I can't wait to try it out!|This will give us an edge in the next battle.
speak;Marisa;This has been...|one of my stranger days.
speak;Joshua;But productive, right?|Who knew mud could be so rewarding?
speak;Marisa;...I'm leaving before you suggest we look for more.
speak;Joshua;Too late!|They say there might be a magic tome buried here too!
speak;Joshua;Was it something I said?|...Hey wait!|Don't you want your share of the treasure?
